comments:
Mylar Version 1.0 with Jira/Subversion.

Happens when hitting the "Synchronize All Tasks
and Queries" Button in the Task list.
Does not seem to do any harm, though.

-- Error
Log --
Date: Tue Dec 12 19:00:59 CET 2006
Message: Error while parsing date field

Severity:
Info
Plugin ID: org.eclipse.mylar.core
Stack Trace:
java.text.ParseException: Unparseable
date: "11 Dec 2006 09:24:01 GMT"
	at java.text.DateFormat.parse(DateFormat.java:335)
	at
org.eclipse.mylar.internal.jira.core.JiraOfflineTaskHandler.getDateForAttributeType(JiraOfflineTaskHandler.java:235)
	at
org.eclipse.mylar.tasks.ui.RepositorySynchronizationManager$GetChangedTasksJob$1.done(RepositorySynchronizationManager.java:220)
	at
org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.JobListeners$3.notify(JobListeners.java:39)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.JobListeners.doNotify(JobListeners.java:112)
	at
org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.JobListeners.done(JobListeners.java:152)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.JobManager.endJob(JobManager.java:540)
	at
org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.WorkerPool.endJob(WorkerPool.java:100)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:74)
Brock, Eugene, are you aware of this date format limitation?
Seems like problem JiraOfflineTaskHandler's fields that store SimpleDateFormat instances. Those are not thread safe. Mik, aren't you wrote this class? Shame on you! :-)
It was likely me Eugene. ;)  IF this is a threading issue I suppose we need to synchronize the getDateForAttributeType() method on all connectors.

(In reply to comment #3)
> It was likely me Eugene. ;)  IF this is a threading issue I suppose we need to
> synchronize the getDateForAttributeType() method on all connectors.

I checked CVS annotations for these fields. Well, maybe Mik moved things around. Anyways, another option could be to create new instance of SimpleDateFormatter on every call.
Rob: please investigate the date formatting.

(In reply to comment #5)
> Rob: please investigate the date formatting.

Just don't save those formatters into fields.
Eugene fixed for Jira. I've done the same for Bugzilla.
*** Bug 169638 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
